data.name: mmpOS Dark Theme
data.description: Join the dark side of the web and save your eyes.

data.name: Poradnik Zdrowie Dark
Guesty goes dark
百度广告屏蔽-搜索-百科-知道-贴吧-文库-音乐
data.description: 屏蔽了百度旗下常用页面常见广告，制作初衷是被这些奇葩广告折磨得心塞，考虑到百度也要赚钱，部分广告并不是删除而是让你看不见也点不了。 务必关闭广告拦截插件，否则百度将会使用shadow dom等工具 强 行 推 送 广 告 可用页面：百度主页（仅一个推广链接）、搜索页、百科、知道、贴吧、文库、音乐 ======== 后续会有更新，如果发现哪天有新的广告出现或者屏蔽失效，请留言并告诉我详细情况 ======== 上B站的小伙伴可以站内搜索我的另一个作品bilibili美化与精简那个作品我也会更新的

data.name: Portainer dark red
data.description: A dark theme for portainer UI (1.22.2) with red accent color

data.name: Patreon dark theme
vogons.org grey background
data.description: Changes the blue/purple background to a dark grey tone that is much more easier on the eyes. This version is work in progress. Updates will follow.

data.name: multitran.com Plain Dark
data.description: The dark theme for the multitran.com. Let's make The Internet dark again!

data.name: Frosty for DC
data.description: Ayy! A lovely theme for a lovely palette! Doesn't work with dark mode, I'm afraid

data.name: Wilting Rose for DC
data.description: A lovely muted theme from a lovely muted palette!

data.name: movie-blog.to BlueDark by TekkRotzzen
data.description: replaces the default colors and images.
